name: Away From Earth: Mars
description: What is the line between genius and crazy? Genius people has a opportunity to perform their crazy ideas to real. A Game that you'll see if can you make Elon Musk's Creating Mars Colony dream as real in 2055 or just die as a normal human...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
